content:
path /v3/egld/transaction/address/address
operationid egldgettransactionaddress
parameters
description address
in path
name address
required true
schema
type string
maxlength 62
minlength 62
summary get count of outgoing egld transactions
description 1 credit per api call
this endpoint allows one to retrieve the latest 20 transactions sent from an address
responses
200
schema
type object
description list of transactions sent from an address
description ok
tag_summary:
elrond egld is a distributed transactional computation protocol which relies on a sharded state architecture and a secure proof of stake consensus mechanism

tatum supports 2 chains
mainnet  a regular live chain
devnet  a chain used for testing purposes coins on the test chain have no value and can be obtained from
a faucet eg https//r3d4fr/elrond/devnet/
title: 19_Elrond_EgldGetTransactionAddress_199.json
